Method Summary
<T> T
deserialize(DeserializationContext context, java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations, Identifier identifier, QueryEndpoint endPoint)

Method Detail

deserialize

<T> T deserialize(DeserializationContext context,
                  java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                  java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations,
                  Identifier identifier,
                  QueryEndpoint endPoint)
              throws DeserializationException
Deserializes a class object returning a new instance.

Parameters:
context - deserialization context.
clazz - class to be deserialized.
annotations - annotations associated to clazz.
identifier - identifier representing the RDF instance.
endPoint - SPARQL endopoint to be used.
Returns:
list of deserialized objects.
Throws:
DeserializationException
